myDesc: Hi there! I am Eka Bachrudin, currently working as a front end developer at Salt Indonesia.
myDesc2: If you're looking for my personal page on the internet, you've come to the right place.
portoDesc: Hi, I’m Eka Bachrudin. I’m currently working as a Front-End Developer at Salt Indonesia. This portfolio is a space where I share my work, career journey, and the projects I’ve been part of. I enjoy building clean, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces. If you’re looking for someone who’s passionate about front-end development and pays attention to detail, I’m glad you found your way here.
